description: This file contains the implementation of a simple TV login activity for an Android application. It handles focus navigation and click events for focusable UI elements such as a title TextView and a login Button, demonstrating DPAD navigation typical for TV interfaces.

classes.name: LoginActivity
classes.description: An Android FragmentActivity subclass that provides a simple TV login screen with focusable controls and handles DPAD navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, makes UI elements focusable, sets focus to the title, and assigns a click listener to the login button.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Overrides key event handling to provide custom behavior for the back key to finish the activity.
